structure.unit: B HOUSING, BUILDINGS, AND CONSTRUCTION - BUILDING CODE

law.text:
The board shall promulgate administrative regulations concerning the continuing education required for the renewal of a home inspector license and shall:
Establish procedures for approving organizations that provide continuing education; and
Prescribe the content, duration, and organization of continuing education courses that contribute to the competence of home inspectors.
law.history: Created 2004 Ky. Acts ch. 109, sec. 13, effective July 13, 2004.
